alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Eastern Magic Valley; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Shoshone, Lava Beds (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 3:38PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Blaine, southeastern Butte, northwestern Power, southwestern Clark and northeastern Minidoka Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 337 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms from near Arco to 12 miles southeast of Craters Of The Moon to 26 miles northwest of Aberdeen. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arco, Craters Of The Moon, Southwest Inl, Central Inl, Moore, Butte City, Coxs Well Airport, Howe and Big Southern Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Eastern Magic Valley; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Shoshone, Lava Beds
